conclusion: To determine relative position at t=10s, compare distances traveled by cars.
Car A travels at constant velocity of 40 m/s from t=0 to t=10s.
Distance traveled by Car A is 400 m.
Car B starts from rest and accelerates uniformly; velocity at t=10s is 40 m/s.
Distance traveled by Car B is 200 m.
At t=10s, Car A has traveled 400 m and Car B 200 m.
Car A is ahead of Car B at t=10s.
